string.description: name of the Init
resource content will be returned as it was at the time of this git hash
the namespace scope in which to operate

bool.description: Save a startup configuration after each commit.

int64.description: Set the management interface IP MTU.

string.description: Static route next hop.
Static route prefix.

list_nested.description: Optional list of static routes to add to the management network instance as part of the initial configuration.

single_nested.description:
Optional management interface settings.
Allows setting DHCP clients or static IPs as well as
the IP MTU.

list.description:
Optional node selectors to perform initial configuration for.
If not provided initialization is performed for all nodes.

single_nested.description: InitSpec defines the desired state of Init
InitStatus defines the observed state of Init

string.description: a comma-separated list of resource fields to fetch/return.  If unspecified, all fields are fetched.  If empty, only key-fields are fetched.
an EQL "where" expression that will be used to filter the set of resources returned.
a label selector string to filter the results based on CR labels
the namespace scope in which to operate
